sentences.english: Gastritis may cause symptoms resembling those of peptic ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 胃炎可引起類似消化性潰瘍的症狀。

sentences.english: But it is sensible to notice that too much spicy food may cause acute gastritis.
sentences.chinese: 但也應該注意喫太多辛辣食物會導致急性胃炎。

sentences.english: Objective To research the mechanism of Weiweikang Keli in treatment of chronic atrophic gastritis(CAG).
sentences.chinese: 目的研究萎胃康顆粒治療慢性萎縮性胃炎的作用。

sentences.english: Two cases of phlegmonous gastritis complicated with subdural hematoma are reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 報告了二例蜂窩織性胃炎伴發硬腦膜下血腫。

sentences.english: Below 45 years of age, chronic atrophic gastritis was seen only in alcoholics.
sentences.chinese: 慢性萎縮性胃炎在45歲以下的人羣中僅見於飲酒者。

sentences.english: To study the relationship between chronic gastritis and immune function of RBC in soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 探討士兵慢性胃炎與細胞免疫功能變化相互關係。

sentences.english: What calls erythema oozy sex gastritis ?
sentences.chinese: 什麼叫紅斑滲出性胃炎？

sentences.english: Experimental study of Weiweikang Keli in treatment of chronic atrophic gastritis;
sentences.chinese: 觀察溫陽化瘀法治療慢性萎縮性胃炎的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy of Huatuo Jaji points for treating chronic gastritis patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察採用華佗夾脊穴治療慢性胃炎的療效。

sentences.english: Chronic gastritis is one of the most commonly seen digestive diseases.
sentences.chinese: 慢性胃炎是最常見的消化系疾病之一。

sentences.english: What medicine does gastroenteritis eat to you can be controlled?
sentences.chinese: 腸胃炎喫什麼藥能控制？

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The new technology improved remarkably the stability of Weiyan granules.
sentences.chinese: 結論該工藝顯著提高了胃炎顆粒劑的穩定性。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Danshen tablets treatment on chronic superficial gastritis.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察複方丹蔘片治療慢性淺表性胃炎的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Don’t use if you have an ulcer or gastritis.
sentences.chinese: 但如果你患的是胃潰瘍或胃炎，就不能用這招了。
